description: This file defines a React functional component for a Jira Projects page that allows users to search for and create Jira projects through an API proxy. It manages user input states, invokes backend tools, and displays results or errors.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Asynchronously invokes the Jira search_projects tool to search for Jira projects based on user-input query and updates the result state.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Asynchronously invokes the Jira create_project tool to create a new Jira project with the specified name from user input.
